desc: The Glambitious Brand provides Marketing, Media and Coaching for Entrepreneurs of Faith to accelerate their business and increase profit. Coaching services are offered by Visionary Lillie Mae to help business owners gain clarity, package their value and market their services or products successfully

layout.text: Are you ready to ACCELERATE your business? I am Lillie Mae, a 10+ year Entrepreneur who activates coaches & creatives to reach their next level. My offers will enhance your recognition & revenue quickly!
